OriginalCompleteBefore: return journal.storageLevel() == StorageLevel.MEMORY || journal.directory().getFreeSpace() < journal.maxSegmentSize() * SEGMENT_BUFFER_FACTOR || journal.directory().getFreeSpace() / (double)journal.directory().getTotalSpace() < FREE_DISK_BUFFER;
OriginalCompleteAfter: return journal.storageLevel() == StorageLevel.MEMORY || journal.directory().getUsableSpace() < journal.maxSegmentSize() * (long)SEGMENT_BUFFER_FACTOR || journal.directory().getUsableSpace() / (double)journal.directory().getTotalSpace() < FREE_DISK_BUFFER;
